images.copyright: Kindergarteners drawing on canvases in Nantong, Jiangsu province, China (© Xu Hui/VCG via Getty Images)
images.title: A day to celebrate teachers
images.caption: A day to celebrate teachers
images.desc: To celebrate World Teachers' Day, we're in the Jiangsu province of China, taking in this birds'-eye view of kindergarteners drawing together under the tutelage of some hard-working teachers. The UN created this day back in 1994 to draw attention to the vital role that teachers play in providing kids a quality education. The observation also highlights the obstacles that teachers face every day, particularly in challenging times like these.
